general_advisory: Keep a watch on the disease and pests as their infestation will increase in recent times. Prepare the field for sowing of summer crops. Provide irrigation whenever soil is dry or plants showing wilting symptoms. Sowing of summer crops can be taken such as cucumber, bitter gourd, watermelon etc.

advisory: Irrigate the field during flowering/fruiting.
Do not irrigate the crop if it has yellowish orange fruits.
Remove wilted, damaged, or diseased plant parts.
Remove Cuscuta (Nirmuli lata) weeds manually.
Spray Chloropyriphos or Imidachloprid for controlling termites.

Restrict irrigation during physiological maturity.
Harvest mustard and Toria at the right time.
Prevent siliqua pods from shattering due to overdrying.
Control aphids and mustard saw fly with Emamectin benzoate.
